m_szDocTitle: One Reason Tesla (TSLA) Stock Is Sliding - TheStreet
m_szDocSumamry: TheStreet One Reason Tesla (TSLA) Stock Is Sliding By Kurumi Fukushima | 06/10/15 - 09:49 AM EDT NEW YORK ( TheStreet ) -- Shares of Tesla Motors Inc ( TSLA - Get Report ) are sliding, down 2.68% to $249.15 in early market trading Wednesday, following the announcement that company CFO Deepak Ahuja will retire this year, according to CEO Elon Musk. Musk made the unexpected announcement at Tesla's annual shareholder meeting. Ahuja, who joined Tesla in 2008 as the company's first financial chief, will help find a successor. In addition, Tesla announced that it will start delivering its Model X sp
